title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: She's been humpingthis big fermer's boy fae West Calder.

title: Our Street. Memories of Buccleuch Place
author: Livingston, Josiah.
snippet: He had been a baker, tolerablysuccessful in business, had been for sometime Deacon of his Craft, and in consequencea member of the old Town Council; and hehad enlarged his mind by obtaining a houseand piece of land near West Calder, where, inthe autumn months he shot, and in the streamclose by he used to fish when he could, as hefrequently did, take a holiday from business.

title: Within a mile o' Edinburgh Town
author: Hardy, Robina F.
snippet: Only that Joe Balquidder's holidayswere extended so as to give him time for a quiet wedding in BroomfieldChurch, aster which he took his fair young bride home to a cottage fullyas pretty as the one he had sighed after so vainly before; that oldWully Fairlie went to West Calder for a few weeks till his new homewas made ready for him ; that Auntie Jean's cottage not being rebuilt,its late tenant has gone to Edinburgh to reside with a cousin, a strictteetotaller, as it happens, where she seems pretty safe and comfortable;that Mrs. Balquidder has taken charge of poor little Tyke and Trudgie,who will henceforth be brought up as her own family have been, andit would be a blessing if all little workhouse children fared as well;that Davie has gone to the Toll nurseries to learn the gardeningtrade, and shows so much aptitude for it that he promises in timeto eclipse even Joe.

title: Within a mile o' Edinburgh Town
author: Hardy, Robina F.
snippet: Wully Fairlie and his wife had come from West Calder, and were readilyarranging about taking the old man to stay with them in the nice newcottage, where he would be near his work and have the bairns to keephim cheery.

title: Within a mile o' Edinburgh Town
author: Hardy, Robina F.
snippet: And it was said that her eldest brother,Willie Fairlie, now at West Calder, was not unlikely in time to beinstalled into one of these by the Laird, as overseer of some works hehad in view.
